data.title: [Capdist-auditions] SUMMER 2024! Broadway Jr camps (fee req)
data.text:
Lisa Franklin divalisa7 at gmail.com

Sat Jun 29 15:42:45 EDT 2024

Previous message (by thread): [Capdist-auditions] AUDITION ANNOUNCEMENT FROM UPSTAGE PRODUCTIONS, INC.

Next message (by thread): [Capdist-auditions] INTO THE BREECHES! Harbinger Auditions for Capital Region Premiere 7/8 & 7/9

Messages sorted by: [ date ] [ thread ] [ subject ] [ author ]

[image: Logo] *Contact Niki at futuretalentco at gmail.com <futuretalentco at gmail.com> with questions or to register* *Unleash Your Talent This Summer: *Register Now for Our Broadway Jr Camps! *July 15th-28th MATILDA JR* *August 5th-18th ROCK OF AGES Jr* *Ages 7yr-18yr* REGISTER NOW! <https://futuretalentco.us9.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4cd99e2d5632d3fb9bd52bee2&id=adab08548a&e=acbd1bc005> Directed by: Niki Reed & Tara Judd with Special guest AMY SPANGER Music Director: Lisa Franklin Dear Future Stars, Get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey filled with music, magic, and endless fun! We’re thrilled to announce our exciting lineup of Broadway Junior Camps for the summer of 2024, where aspiring young performers can hone their skills, make new friends, and shine on stage! 1. Matilda Jr. Camp: July 15th - July 28th Step into the enchanting world of Roald Dahl’s beloved story with our production of Matilda Jr.! From July 15th to the 28th, join us as we bring this timeless tale to life on stage. Led by industry professionals and featuring workshops, rehearsals, and a spectacular showcase performance, this camp is your chance to unleash your creativity and star power! *Amy Spanger as Mrs. Wormwood: * *https://youtu.be/n0mT-WuxJJ0?si=2PKq31UyPPkinMse* <https://futuretalentco.us9.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4cd99e2d5632d3fb9bd52bee2&id=8ff0231990&e=acbd1bc005> 2. Rock of Ages Jr. Camp: August 5th - August 18th Get ready to rock out like never before with our production of Rock of Ages Jr.! Led by Broadway star Amy Spanger, original Sherry from Rock of Ages on Broadway, this camp promises an electrifying experience for young performers. From singing classic 80s hits to mastering show-stopping choreography, you’ll learn from the best and rock the stage with confidence! Spaces are limited, so don’t miss your chance to be part of the magic! *Amy Spanger at the Tonys!: **https://youtu.be/dBI0DNn0g_c?si=jiiRkksuN_JaSVrh * <https://futuretalentco.us9.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4cd99e2d5632d3fb9bd52bee2&id=58886fd1a5&e=acbd1bc005> Register now to secure your spot in our Broadway Junior Camps and make this summer one to remember. *Whether you’re a seasoned performer or just starting out, there’s something for everyone at Future TalentCo. For more information and to register, visit www.futuretalentco.com <http://www.futuretalentco.com> or contact us at futuretalentco at gmail.com <futuretalentco at gmail.com>. We can’t wait to see you shine on stage!* Warm regards, Miss Niki Reed *518-727-2889* Owner/Director Future Talent Co. & Miss Tara Judd Owner Kennedy Talent [image: Facebook icon] <https://futuretalentco.us9.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4cd99e2d5632d3fb9bd52bee2&id=6892262d07&e=acbd1bc005> [image: Logo] *www.futuretalentco.com <http://www.futuretalentco.com> (518)727-2889* -------------- next part -------------- An HTML attachment was scrubbed... URL: <http://capdisttheater.org/pipermail/capdist-auditions/attachments/20240629/610eb615/attachment.html>
